title: I Was Summoned as a Saint, but I’m Going Home Because I Have a Boyfriend - Novel Updates
tags: Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Magic   Oneshot   Saints   Summoning Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Kamiyama Rio   神山 りお
description:
Takano Shiori was on a honeymoon with her boyfriend.

If you were summoned as a [Saint] during such a sweet time, of course you'll be pissed.

What are you doing? Please return me.>
